original_text: But when the people of the land shall come before the Lord in the solemn feasts, he that entereth in by the way of the north gate to worship shall go out by the way of the south gate; and he that entereth by the way of the south gate shall go forth by the way of the north gate: he shall not return by the way of the gate whereby he came in, but shall go forth over against it.
korean_text: 그러나 모든 정한 절기에 이 땅 백성이 나 여호와 앞에 나아올 때에는 북문으로 들어와서 경배하는 자는 남문으로 나가고 남문으로 들어오는 자는 북문으로 나갈지라 들어온 문으로 도로 나가지 말고 그 몸이 앞으로 향한 대로 나갈지며

sentences.original_text: But when the people of the land shall come
before the Lord in the solemn feasts
he that entereth in by the way of the north gate
to worship shall go out by the way of the south gate
and he that entereth by the way of the south gate
shall go forth by the way of the north gate
he shall not return by the way of the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 문으로 다시 돌아가지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: but shall go forth over against it
